name: Deppe Communications
tagline: Make A Smart Move For Your Business.
description: Kim Deppe, president of Deppe Communications, provides outsourced marketing and public relations services for businesses. We specialize in online marketing as well as traditional marketing, including SEO, social media, web content and PPC advertising. Deppe Communications can help your business develop a marketing strategy customized to your goals and your budget, then implement it for you.
